actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to clarify the requirement that medical services be provided by the Veterans' Administration in certain cases.

summary.text: Repeals the requirement that medical services be furnished only within the limits of Veterans' Administration facilities to eligible veterans receiving an allowance for regular care and attendance or veterans who are permanently housebound.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to clarify the requirement that medical services be provided by the Veterans' Administration in certain cases.
